name: NSPersistentHistoryChange
desc: A change representing the insertion, update, or deletion of a managed object in the persistent store.

items.name: class var fetchRequest: NSFetchRequest<NSFetchRequestResult>?
items.desc: A fetch request that has the persistent history change as the entity.

items.name: class var entityDescription: NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: The entity description of the persistent history change entity.

items.name: class func entityDescription(with: NSManagedObjectContext) -> NSEntityDescription?
items.desc: Requests an entity description for the managed object type affected by the change using the provided context.

items.name: var changeType: NSPersistentHistoryChangeType
items.desc: The type of change to the managed object in the persistent store.

items.name: enum NSPersistentHistoryChangeType
items.desc: The types of changes to managed objects reflected in persistent history.

items.name: var changedObjectID: NSManagedObjectID
items.desc: The identifier of the managed object that changed.

items.name: var tombstone: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of attributes marked for preservation after deletion, and their values when deleted.

items.name: var transaction: NSPersistentHistoryTransaction?
items.desc: The persistent history transaction containing this change.

items.name: var updatedProperties: Set<NSPropertyDescription>?
items.desc: The set of properties that were updated on the managed object.
